nodes.text: Jan was a human male soldier for the Alliance to Restore the Republic. During the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance and the Galactic Empire, he fought Imperial troops on the moon Jedha.
Jan was a human male who joined the Alliance to Restore the Republic sometime during or before the year 0 BBY.
Jan was a light-skinned human with black eyes.
Jan wore the fatigues of a Rebel trooper.
Jan was created as a playable character for the online browser video game Star Wars: Boots on the Ground. Players could select Jan to be a member of their three-man rebel squad.
